name: Cadenza of the Stars
description:
Create beautfiul constellations in the sky together.

Use left click and drag to connect stars. Right click and drag can be used to have a star as an offbeat, so it will not play that note. Space bar will cycle instruments.

For connecting we used portforwarding. The host has to press host to start the server.

We used a third party software called Hamachi to connect.

To use hamachi download it here: https://www.vpn.net/

Once downloaded create a room with the other user. The connecting player must copy the hosts IPV4 Adress and paste it into the text bar in the game and click connect.

Make sure both players are connected before pressing lookup button.
